saveLocation.title: Footnote Location
saveLocation.description: Current document, Specified document or Child Document

docId.title: Specified Document ID
docId.description: Takes effect when footnote location is set to Specified document

footnoteContainerTitle.title: Footnote Container Title
footnoteContainerTitle.description:
Set the h2 title to store footnotes when the footnote location is set to Current Document.
Set the document title when the footnote location is set to Child Document.
Template variable: Current document title ${filename}

footnoteContainerTitle2.title: Footnote Container Title for Specified Document and Child Document
footnoteContainerTitle2.description:
Set the h2 title to store footnotes when the footnote location is set to Specified Document.
Set the document title when the footnote location is set to Child Document.
Template variable: Current document title ${filename}

updateFootnoteContainerTitle.title: Auto-update footnote container title?
updateFootnoteContainerTitle.description: Auto-update footnote container title to match template every time a footnote is created?

template.title: Footnote Template
template.description:
Template variables: ${selection} is the content of the selected text , ${content} is the placeholder for footnote content, and ${refID} is the block ID containing the selected text
You can use kramdown syntax to style the block.

errors.noDocId: [Block Ref Footnote Plugin] Please fill in the specified document ID
